author: Madeleine Carlisle
title: Hospital in Thailand Gives Newborn Babies Tiny Face Shields as Protection From Coronavirus
description: The hospital tells TIME the face shields were specially made to protect the babies while they traveled home from the hospital.
content: Even amidst a pandemic, life goes on. That’s certainly the case at Praram 9 Hospital in Bangkok, Thailand, where on Thursday, two newborn babies were given tiny face shields to help protect them from COVID-19 — the diseased cased by the novel coronavirus — wh… [+2425 chars]
